location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 16; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns appointments at the HM Vice-Consulate at Hamadan, including the appointments of Vice-Consuls J R Hobbins in 1943, and B A L Thomsett and J E D'Aeth in 1944.The file is composed solely of internal correspondence between the British Legation at Tehran, the Foreign Office, the India Office, the Secretary of State for India, and the Government of India.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
